TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartMenuStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartMenuStyle Inherits TableStyle Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
public ref class WebPartMenuStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle, System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor
type WebPartMenuStyle = class inherit TableStyle interface ICustomTypeDescriptor

Docs.summary: Contains style characteristics for menus on controls. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class is essentially a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> object, which contains style characteristics to apply to menus on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
The Web Parts control set uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object to determine the style characteristics of the verbs menu on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control. A verbs menu is contained in the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and it includes various user interface (UI) actions (called verbs) that users can perform, such as closing, minimizing, exporting, or deleting a control.
> [!IMPORTANT] > You can set style attributes on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object, and thus on the verbs menu of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuPopupStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class has two important properties. The first is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A> property, which determines whether the content of the menu is aligned on the left, the center, or the right of the control or the alignment is not set. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property determines the color of the shadow for the menu on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, if the menu shadowing feature is enabled on the user's system.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class also has some critical methods. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.CopyFrom%2A> method copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed into the method, and applies them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.MergeWith%2A> method similarly copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed to the method, but it does not overwrite existing style elements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.Reset%2A> method removes any defined style elements from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object's state bag.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class also implements all the methods contained in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface. In general, this enables the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class to be applied to different types of menus.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

Docs.param: A that contains style information to copy.
Docs.summary: Copies nonblank style elements to the object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.CopyFrom%2A> method copies style information from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, and if there are any existing style elements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> instance, it overwrites them.
> [!NOTE] > One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property HorizontalAlign As HorizontalAlign

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign value); };
member this.HorizontalAlign : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating what type of horizontal alignment to use for the content of a menu on a control.
Docs.value: A enumeration value that specifies what type of alignment to use. The default value is obtained from the base property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A> property overrides the base property to prevent the alignment from being set, and to add some attributes to the property. The property gets its value from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value, but does not provide any implementation for the setter, so you cannot set the alignment of the menu content by using this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

Docs.param: A that contains style information to copy.
Docs.summary: Copies nonblank style elements to the instance, but does not overwrite existing style elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.MergeWith%2A> method is similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.CopyFrom%2A> method in that it copies style elements from a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, but it differs in that it does not overwrite any existing style elements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> instance.
> [!NOTE] > One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes any defined style elements from the object's state bag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.Reset%2A> method is very similar to the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> class. After some custom handling for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property, this method simply calls the base method to remove any remaining style elements from the state bag.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ShadowColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines the shadow color for a menu on a control.
Docs.value: A that determines the shadow color. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property takes effect only when users have the Microsoft Windows menu-shadowing feature enabled on their systems. When menu shadowing is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property sets the color of the shadow that is created around the menu content. If no color value is assigned to the property, no shadow will appear on menus, even if menu shadowing is enabled on the system.
